title: Michael Saylor: A genius or madman? #bitcoin #btc #microstrategy #crypto #ytshorts #fypã‚·
transcript: Love him or hate him, Michael Sailor is one of the most recognizable [music] figures in crypto. Micro Strategy was sitting on half a billion dollars in cash and Sailor realized something. Cash wasn't safe. [music] It was melting like an ice cube, as he said, and he didn't want to watch it drip away. After months of research, he flipped from skeptic to believer.
